title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 02, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 02, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [KLEE](http://klee.github.io/) — A dynamic symbolic execution engine built on top of the LLVM compiler infrastructure.  It can auto-generate test cases for programs such that the test cases exercise as much of the program as possible.
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • KLEE — A dynamic symbolic execution engine built on top of the LLVM compiler infrastructure. It can auto-generate test cases for programs such that the test cases exercise as much of the program as possible.

items.title: Awesome Dotnet
items.content_text:
### Visual Studio Plugins / GUI - other

*   [SonarSource.sonarlint-visualstudio (⭐474)](https://github.com/SonarSource/sonarlint-visualstudio) - SonarLint is a free, open source Visual Studio 2017, 2019 and 2022 extension that provides on-the-fly feedback to developers on new bugs and quality issues in C#, VB.NET, C/C++, TypeScript and JavaScript.

### Source Generator / GUI - other

*   [M31.FluentAPI (⭐118)](https://github.com/m31coding/M31.FluentAPI) - Effortlessly generate fluent APIs for your C# classes.
*   [Supernova.Enum.Generators (⭐192)](https://github.com/EngRajabi/Enum.Source.Generator) - A C# source generator to create an enumeration class from an enum type. With this package, you can work on enums very, very fast without using reflection.
items.content_html:
Visual Studio Plugins / GUI - other

  • SonarSource.sonarlint-visualstudio (⭐474) - SonarLint is a free, open source Visual Studio 2017, 2019 and 2022 extension that provides on-the-fly feedback to developers on new bugs and quality issues in C#, VB.NET, C/C++, TypeScript and JavaScript.

Source Generator / GUI - other

  • M31.FluentAPI (⭐118) - Effortlessly generate fluent APIs for your C# classes.
  • Supernova.Enum.Generators (⭐192) - A C# source generator to create an enumeration class from an enum type. With this package, you can work on enums very, very fast without using reflection.

items.title: Awesome Nextjs
items.content_text:
### Apps

*   [Twitter Clone (⭐193)](https://github.com/AlandSleman/t3-twitter-clone) - Twitter clone built with Next.js + T3 Stack + NextAuth + Supabase + Prisma.
items.content_html:
Apps

  • Twitter Clone (⭐193) - Twitter clone built with Next.js + T3 Stack + NextAuth + Supabase + Prisma.

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

*   [cleanlab (⭐11k)](https://github.com/cleanlab/cleanlab): The standard data-centric AI package for data quality and machine learning with messy, real-world data and labels.

### Python / Spiking Neural Networks

*   [Rockpool (⭐68)](https://github.com/synsense/rockpool) - A machine learning library for spiking neural networks. Supports training with both torch and jax pipelines, and deployment to neuromorphic hardware.

### Tools / Misc

*   [Humanloop](https://humanloop.com) – Humanloop is a platform for prompt experimentation, finetuning models for better performance, cost optimization, and collecting model generated data and user feedback.
*   [DockerDL (⭐81)](https://github.com/matifali/dockerdl) - Ready to use deeplearning docker images.
items.content_html:
Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

  • cleanlab (⭐11k): The standard data-centric AI package for data quality and machine learning with messy, real-world data and labels.

Python / Spiking Neural Networks

  • Rockpool (⭐68) - A machine learning library for spiking neural networks. Supports training with both torch and jax pipelines, and deployment to neuromorphic hardware.

Tools / Misc

  • Humanloop – Humanloop is a platform for prompt experimentation, finetuning models for better performance, cost optimization, and collecting model generated data and user feedback.
  • DockerDL (⭐81) - Ready to use deeplearning docker images.

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### GTFS Converters / Rust

*   [gtfs2emis (⭐28)](https://github.com/ipeaGIT/gtfs2emis) - An R package to estimate the emission levels of public transport vehicles based on General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) data.
*   [gtsf (⭐3)](https://github.com/r-gtfs/gtsf) - general transit (GTFS) simple (geographic) features (sf) in R. can be used to convert from GTFS to Shapefile, GeoJSON, and other formats through GDAL.
items.content_html:
GTFS Converters / Rust

  • gtfs2emis (⭐28) - An R package to estimate the emission levels of public transport vehicles based on General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) data.
  • gtsf (⭐3) - general transit (GTFS) simple (geographic) features (sf) in R. can be used to convert from GTFS to Shapefile, GeoJSON, and other formats through GDAL.

items.title: Awesome Playwright
items.content_text:
### Utils

*   [Playwright-cleanup](https://www.npmjs.com/package/playwright-cleanup) - A Playwright cleanup tool that simplifies test cleanup by undoing any changes to the testing environment.
items.content_html:
Utils

  • Playwright-cleanup - A Playwright cleanup tool that simplifies test cleanup by undoing any changes to the testing environment.

items.title: Awesome Elixir
items.content_text:
### Debugging

*   [inspector (⭐15)](https://github.com/marciol/inspector) - A simple one-line module that allows a more friendly debugging experience.

### Miscellaneous

*   [exisbn (⭐3)](https://github.com/solar05/exisbn) - ISBN validation and formatting library.

### ORM and Datamapping

*   [walex (⭐320)](https://github.com/cpursley/walex) - PostgreSQL Change Data Capture (CDC) events listener in Elixir.
items.content_html:
Debugging

  • inspector (⭐15) - A simple one-line module that allows a more friendly debugging experience.

Miscellaneous

  • exisbn (⭐3) - ISBN validation and formatting library.

ORM and Datamapping

  • walex (⭐320) - PostgreSQL Change Data Capture (CDC) events listener in Elixir.

items.title: Awesome Vulkan
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   Frameworks, Engines, Higher Level Rendering
    *   [Acid (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/Equilibrium-Games/Acid) - A high speed C++17 Vulkan game engine. \[MIT]
    *   [AMD's Anvil (⭐601)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/Anvil) - cross-platform framework for Vulkan. \[[LICENSE (⭐601)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/Anvil/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)]
    *   [Auto-Vk (⭐294)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/Auto-Vk) - Vulkan convenience and productivity layer for modern C++, atop Vulkan-Hpp, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. \[MIT]
    *   [Auto-Vk-Toolkit (⭐426)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/Auto-Vk-Toolkit) - C++ framework around [Auto-Vk (⭐294)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/Auto-Vk) for rapid prototyping, research, and teaching, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. \[MIT for the framework's code]
    *   [bgfx (⭐16k)](https://github.com/bkaradzic/bgfx#bgfx---cross-platform-rendering-library) - Cross-platform, graphics API agnostic, "Bring Your Own Engine/Framework" style rendering library. \[[BSD-2-clause (⭐16k)](https://github.com/bkaradzic/bgfx/blob/master/LICENSE)]
    *   [bsf (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/GameFoundry/bsf) - Modern C++14 library for the development of real-time graphical applications. \[MIT]
    *   [Cinder (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/cinder/Cinder) and [the story](https://libcinder.org/notes/vulkan) [behind](https://forum.libcinder.org/#Topic/23286000002614007). \[BSD]
    *   [DemoFramework (⭐315)](https://github.com/NXPmicro/gtec-demo-framework) - NXP GTEC C++11 cross-platform demo framework including lots of samples for Vulkan, OpenGL ES, OpenVX, OpenCL, OpenVG and OpenCV. \[[BSD-3-clause (⭐315)](https://github.com/NXPmicro/gtec-demo-framework/blob/master/License.md)]
    *   [Diligent Engine (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/DiligentGraphics/DiligentEngine) - a modern cross-platform low-level graphics library that supports OpenGL/GLES, Direct3D11/12 and Vulkan. \[Apache License 2.0]
    *   [Falcor (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/NVIDIAGameWorks/Falcor) - Real-time rendering framework from NVIDIA, supporting mainly DX12, with experimental Vulkan support. \[BSD 3-clause]
    *   [glfw (⭐14k)](https://github.com/glfw/glfw) and [the guide](http://www.glfw.org/docs/3.2/vulkan.html).  \[[LICENSE (⭐14k)](https://github.com/glfw/glfw/blob/master/LICENSE.md)]
    *   [Intrinsic Engine (⭐1k)](https://github.com/begla/Intrinsic) - Intrinsic is a Vulkan based cross-platform graphics and game engine. \[Apache License 2.0]
    *   [Introductory Vulkan sample by GPUOpen (⭐120)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/HelloVulkan). \[MIT]
    *   [liblava (⭐834)](https://github.com/liblava/liblava) - A modern C++ and easy-to-use framework. \[MIT]
    *   [Logi (⭐16)](https://github.com/UL-FRI-LGM/Logi) - Light-weight object oriented Vulkan abstraction framework. \[BSD 2-clause]
    *   [Lugdunum (⭐246)](https://github.com/Lugdunum3D/Lugdunum) - Modern cross-platform 3D rendering engine built with Vulkan and modern C++14. \[MIT]
    *   [openFrameworks (⭐65)](https://github.com/openframeworks-vk/openFrameworks) - the most famouse C++ creative coding framework. \[MIT]
    *   [PowerVR SDK (⭐740)](https://github.com/powervr-graphics/Native_SDK) - C++ cross-platform 3D graphics SDK to speed up development of Vulkan and GLES. \[[LICENSE (⭐740)](https://github.com/powervr-graphics/Native_SDK/blob/4.1/LICENSE_POWERVR_SDK.txt)]
    *   [Pumex (⭐295)](https://github.com/pumexx/pumex) - cross-platform Vulkan renderer implementing frame graph and simple scene graph. Able to render on many surfaces at once \[MIT]
    *   [SDL](https://discourse.libsdl.org/t/sdl-2-0-6-released/23109) - added cross-platform Vulkan graphics support in SDL\_vulkan.h. \[zlib]
    *   [small3d](https://www.gamedev.net/projects/515-small3d/), Tiny Vulkan based C++ cross-platform game development framework \[BSD 3-clause]
    *   [Spectrum (⭐14)](https://github.com/mwalczyk/spectrum_core) - Work-in-progress framework and abstraction layer around Vulkan.
    *   [Tephra (⭐38)](https://github.com/Dolkar/Tephra) - A modern C++17 graphics and compute library filling the gap between Vulkan and high-level APIs like OpenGL. \[MIT]
    *   [The-Forge (⭐5.2k)](https://github.com/ConfettiFX/The-Forge) - DirectX 12, Vulkan, macOS Metal 2 rendering framework. \[Apache License 2.0]
    *   [VKFS (⭐10)](https://github.com/MHDtA-dev/VKFS) - Cross-platform easy-to-use C++ framework that allows you to quickly initialize Vulkan and get a ready-made environment. Provides high-level abstraction over basic Vulkan objects.
    *   [Vulkan Launchpad (⭐76)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/VulkanLaunchpad) - Vulkan framework for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Especially well-suited for Vulkan beginners, used in university education, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. \[MIT]
        *   [Vulkan Launchpad Starter (⭐24)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/VulkanLaunchpadStarter) - Starter template containing additional functionality and assets. [\[LICENSE\] (⭐24)](https://github.com/cg-tuwien/VulkanLaunchpadStarter/blob/main/LICENSE)
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • Frameworks, Engines, Higher Level Rendering
    • Acid (⭐1.9k) - A high speed C++17 Vulkan game engine. [MIT]
    • AMD's Anvil (⭐601) - cross-platform framework for Vulkan. [LICENSE (⭐601)]
    • Auto-Vk (⭐294) - Vulkan convenience and productivity layer for modern C++, atop Vulkan-Hpp, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT]
    • Auto-Vk-Toolkit (⭐426) - C++ framework around Auto-Vk (⭐294) for rapid prototyping, research, and teaching, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT for the framework's code]
    • bgfx (⭐16k) - Cross-platform, graphics API agnostic, "Bring Your Own Engine/Framework" style rendering library. [BSD-2-clause (⭐16k)]
    • bsf (⭐1.8k) - Modern C++14 library for the development of real-time graphical applications. [MIT]
    • Cinder (⭐5.4k) and the story behind. [BSD]
    • DemoFramework (⭐315) - NXP GTEC C++11 cross-platform demo framework including lots of samples for Vulkan, OpenGL ES, OpenVX, OpenCL, OpenVG and OpenCV. [BSD-3-clause (⭐315)]
    • Diligent Engine (⭐3.9k) - a modern cross-platform low-level graphics library that supports OpenGL/GLES, Direct3D11/12 and Vulkan. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Falcor (⭐2.9k) - Real-time rendering framework from NVIDIA, supporting mainly DX12, with experimental Vulkan support. [BSD 3-clause]
    • glfw (⭐14k) and the guide. [LICENSE (⭐14k)]
    • Intrinsic Engine (⭐1k) - Intrinsic is a Vulkan based cross-platform graphics and game engine. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Introductory Vulkan sample by GPUOpen (⭐120). [MIT]
    • liblava (⭐834) - A modern C++ and easy-to-use framework. [MIT]
    • Logi (⭐16) - Light-weight object oriented Vulkan abstraction framework. [BSD 2-clause]
    • Lugdunum (⭐246) - Modern cross-platform 3D rendering engine built with Vulkan and modern C++14. [MIT]
    • openFrameworks (⭐65) - the most famouse C++ creative coding framework. [MIT]
    • PowerVR SDK (⭐740) - C++ cross-platform 3D graphics SDK to speed up development of Vulkan and GLES. [LICENSE (⭐740)]
    • Pumex (⭐295) - cross-platform Vulkan renderer implementing frame graph and simple scene graph. Able to render on many surfaces at once [MIT]
    • SDL - added cross-platform Vulkan graphics support in SDL_vulkan.h. [zlib]
    • small3d, Tiny Vulkan based C++ cross-platform game development framework [BSD 3-clause]
    • Spectrum (⭐14) - Work-in-progress framework and abstraction layer around Vulkan.
    • Tephra (⭐38) - A modern C++17 graphics and compute library filling the gap between Vulkan and high-level APIs like OpenGL. [MIT]
    • The-Forge (⭐5.2k) - DirectX 12, Vulkan, macOS Metal 2 rendering framework. [Apache License 2.0]
    • VKFS (⭐10) - Cross-platform easy-to-use C++ framework that allows you to quickly initialize Vulkan and get a ready-made environment. Provides high-level abstraction over basic Vulkan objects.
    • Vulkan Launchpad (⭐76) - Vulkan framework for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Especially well-suited for Vulkan beginners, used in university education, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT]
      • Vulkan Launchpad Starter (⭐24) - Starter template containing additional functionality and assets. [LICENSE] (⭐24)

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Clipboard Tools

*   [ClipTools](https://macmost.com/cliptools) - ClipTools is a status menu application that gives you access to a variety of simple clipboard utilities. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware") [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/cliptools/id1619348240?mt=12)
items.content_html:
Utilities / Clipboard Tools

  • ClipTools - ClipTools is a status menu application that gives you access to a variety of simple clipboard utilities.
